TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebProxy extends System.Object implements class System.Net.IWebProxy, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type WebProxy = class interface ISerializable interface IWebProxy

summary.span: 包含 類別的 HTTP Proxy 設定。

span.span: Contains HTTP proxy settings for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含的 proxy 設定，來判斷是否使用 Web proxy 傳送要求的執行個體使用。The class contains the proxy settings that instances use to determine whether a Web proxy is used to send requests. 全域 Web proxy 設定可以指定機器和應用程式組態檔，以及應用程式中可以使用的執行個體自訂 Web proxy 使用的類別。Global Web proxy settings can be specified in machine and application configuration files, and applications can use instances of the class to customize Web proxy use. 類別是基底實作介面。The class is the base implementation of the interface. 若要取得 Web proxy 類別的執行個體，您可以使用下列方法之一：To obtain instances of the Web proxy class, you can use any of the following methods: - 建構函式。The constructor. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. 這些方法都會提供執行個體，您可以進一步自訂; 它們之間的差異是回到您的應用程式前要如何初始化執行個體。These methods each supply a instance that you can further customize; the difference between them is how the instance is initialized before it is returned to your application. 建構函式傳回的執行個體類別屬性設定為`null`。The constructor returns an instance of the class with the property set to `null`. 當要求時，使用處於此狀態，沒有任何 proxy 的執行個體用來傳送要求。When a request uses a instance in this state, no proxy is used to send the request. 方法傳回的執行個體類別， ，和屬性設為 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更新版本使用的值。The method returns an instance of the class with the , , and properties set to the values used by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later. 方法傳回的執行個體類別與其根據 Internet Explorer 和組態檔設定的組合所設定的屬性。The method returns an instance of the class with it properties set according to a combination of Internet Explorer and configuration file settings. 類別支援自動偵測及執行 proxy 組態指令碼。The class supports automatic detection and execution of proxy configuration scripts. 這項功能也稱為「Web Proxy 自動探索 (WPAD)」。This feature is also known as Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD). 使用自動 proxy 組態時，通常名為 Wpad.dat，組態指令碼必須位於、 下載、 編譯，並執行。When using automatic proxy configuration, a configuration script, typically named Wpad.dat, must be located, downloaded, compiled, and run. 如果這些作業都成功，則指令碼會傳回可用於要求的 proxy。If these operations are successful, the script returns the proxies that can be used for a request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會指派執行個體執行個體。The following code example assigns a instance to a instance. 執行個體會使用 proxy 連線到外部的網際網路資源。The instance uses the proxy to connect to external Internet resources. (如需示範如何使用 WPAD 功能的範例，請參閱文件類別。)(For an example that demonstrates using the WPAD feature, see the documentation for the class.) [!code-cpp[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式初始化的空執行個體類別搭配屬性設定為`null`。The default constructor initializes an empty instance of the class with the property set to `null`. 當屬性是`null`，則方法會傳回`true`而方法會傳回目的地位址。When the property is `null`, the method returns `true` and the method returns the destination address. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor. summary.span: 取得或設定 Proxy 伺服器的位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the address of the proxy server.

value.span: 執行個體，其中包含 Proxy 伺服器的位址。

span.span: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含 proxy 伺服器的位址。The property contains the address of the proxy server. 當未啟用自動 proxy 偵測，並指定任何自動設定指令碼，則屬性和決定要求所使用的 proxy。When automatic proxy detection is not enabled, and no automatic configuration script is specified, the property and determine the proxy used for a request. 當屬性是`null`，要求略過 proxy 並直接連接到目的地主機。When the property is `null`, requests bypass the proxy and connect directly to the destination host. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性物件，包括其。The following code example displays the properties of a object, including its . [!code-cpp[NCLAutoProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CPP/proxy.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLAutoProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CS/proxy.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得不使用 Proxy 伺服器的位址清單。

span.span: An that contains a list of arrays that represents URIs that do not use the proxy server when accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是描述 Uri 的規則運算式字串的陣列清單，執行個體直接而不是透過 proxy 伺服器存取。The is an array list of regular expression strings that describe the URIs that a instance accesses directly instead of through the proxy server.

summary.span: 取得或設定不使用 Proxy 伺服器的位址陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of addresses that do not use the proxy server.

value.span: 陣列，包含描述存取時不使用 Proxy 伺服器之 URI 的規則運算式清單。

span.span: An array that contains a list of regular expressions that describe URIs that do not use the proxy server when accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含規則運算式，說明 Uri 的陣列，執行個體直接而不是透過 proxy 伺服器存取。The property contains an array of regular expressions that describe URIs that a instance accesses directly instead of through the proxy server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性物件，包括其屬性。The following code example displays the properties of a object, including its property. [!code-cpp[NCLAutoProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CPP/proxy.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLAutoProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CS/proxy.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 若要對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性會決定是否執行個體會在存取本機網際網路資源時使用 proxy 伺服器。The setting of the property determines whether instances use the proxy server when accessing local Internet resources. 若 為 `true`，則對於本機網際網路資源的要求不會使用 Proxy 伺服器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 本機要求識別沒有句號 （.） 在 URI 中，依照http://webserver/，或存取本機伺服器，包括http://localhost， http://loopback，或http://127.0.0.1。Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in http://webserver/, or access the local server, including http://localhost, http://loopback, or http://127.0.0.1. 若 為 `false`，則所有的網際網路要求都會經過 Proxy 伺服器。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server. > [!NOTE] > 包含句號的本機主機的 uri 要求使用 proxy。Requests to a local host with a URI that contain a period use the proxy. 若要避免在這些情況下使用 proxy，請在主機中建立項目。To avoid using a proxy in these cases, create an entry for the host in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫會設定這個屬性的建構函式，並取得這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates calling a constructor that sets this property and getting the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#7)]

summary.span: 取得或設定認證，提交到 Proxy 伺服器進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

value.span: 執行個體，包含送出至 Proxy 伺服器進行驗證的認證。

span.span: An instance that contains the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含傳送至 proxy 伺服器以 HTTP 407 （proxy 授權） 狀態碼回應的驗證認證。The property contains the authentication credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code. 在大部分的用戶端案例中，您應該使用，這是目前登入使用者的認證。In most client scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性設`true`而不是設定這個屬性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定認證以外的屬性，將屬性設`true`造成。If you set the property to credentials other than the , setting the property to `true` causes a . 若要避免這個問題，您必須設定屬性，以`null`內容，才能設定屬性設`true`。To prevent this, you must set the property to `null` before setting the property to `true`. 同樣地，您無法設定這個屬性，為任何值時是`true`。Likewise, you cannot set this property to any value when is `true`.

exception.span: 當 屬性設為 時，您可以嘗試設定這個屬性。

span.span: You attempted to set this property when the property was set to .

summary.span: 讀取 Internet Explorer 非動態 Proxy 設定。

span.span: Reads the Internet Explorer nondynamic proxy settings.

returns.span: 執行個體，包含來自 Internet Explorer 5.5 (含) 以後版本的非動態 Proxy 設定。

span.span: A instance that contains the nondynamic proxy settings from Internet Explorer 5.5 and later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法讀取 Internet Explorer 5.5 及更新版本中，儲存的非動態 proxy 設定，並建立這些設定的執行個體。The method reads the nondynamic proxy settings stored by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later, and creates a instance with those settings. 方法不會拾取從 Internet Explorer 所執行的指令碼，自動設定項目，或 DHCP 或 DNS 查閱所產生的任何動態設定。The method does not pick up any dynamic settings that are generated from scripts run by Internet Explorer, from automatic configuration entries, or from DHCP or DNS lookups. 應用程式應該改用屬性和方法，而非方法。Applications should use the property and the method instead of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#11)]

permission.span: 不受限制存取網路資源。

span.span: for unrestricted access to network resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的 URI，用來存取網際網路資源的執行個體。The method returns the URI that the instance uses to access the Internet resource. 比較`destination`的內容，並使用方法。 compares `destination` with the contents of , using the method. 如果會傳回`true`，會傳回`destination`而執行個體不會使用 proxy 伺服器。If returns `true`, returns `destination` and the instance does not use the proxy server. 如果`destination`不是處於，則執行個體會使用 proxy 伺服器和會傳回屬性。If `destination` is not in , the instance uses the proxy server and the property is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件，並呼叫此方法來取得資源的已選取的 proxy。The following code example creates a object and calls this method to get the proxy that is selected for a resource. [!code-cpp[NCLAutoProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CPP/proxy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLAutoProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CS/proxy.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來判斷是否要存取網際網路資源時，請略過 proxy 伺服器。The method is used to determine whether to bypass the proxy server when accessing an Internet resource. 並屬性可控制的傳回值方法。The and properties control the return value of the method. 傳回`true`任何下列的情況下： returns `true` under any of the following conditions: - 如果已`true`和`host`是本機的 URI。If is `true` and `host` is a local URI. 本機要求識別沒有句號 （.） 在 URI 中，依照 「http://webserver/"。Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in "http://webserver/". - 如果`host`符合規則運算式中的。If `host` matches a regular expression in . - 如果 為 `null`。If is `null`. 所有其他條件傳回`false`。All other conditions return `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件，並呼叫此方法來檢查是否已正確設定略過清單。The following code example creates a object and calls this method to check whether the bypass list is properly set. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseDefaultCredentials { get; set; }

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，控制是否隨著要求傳送 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the are sent with requests.

value.span: 如果使用預設認證則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the default credentials are used; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`當要求所做的變更物件應該如果要求的伺服器上，驗證使用目前登入使用者的認證。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 用戶端應用程式，這是在大部分情況下想要的行為。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 對於中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式，而不是使用這個屬性，您通常設定屬性，以代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 下表顯示設定的作用的值為基礎的值屬性。The following table shows the effect of setting the value, based on the value of the property. | 值 value| 值 value|作用Effect| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| ||`true`|沒有影響。No effect.| ||`false`| 設定為 `null`。 is set to `null`.| |`null`|`true`| 設定為 。 is set to .| |以外的任何值或 `null`Any value other than or `null`|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|設定會擲回例外狀況。Setting throws an exception.| 如果已`false`，您可以變更任何認證的屬性。If is `false`, you can change the property to any credentials. 如果已`true`，變更屬性從(時，會設定值屬性設定為`true`) 將會擲回例外狀況。If is `true`, changing the property from (the value that is set when the property is set to `true`) will throw an exception.

exception.span: 當 屬性包含預設認證以外的認證時，您可以嘗試設定這個屬性。

span.span: You attempted to set this property when the property contains credentials other than the default credentials.
